musical_training_years.Description: Participant's self-reported number of years of musical training

formal_musical_training_years.Description: Participant's self-reported number of years of formal (group/private lessons) musical training

tonal_language_speaker.Description: Participant's self-reported if they are tonal language speaker

L_6000.Description: hearing threshold for 6000 Hz in the left ear

L_8000.Description: hearing threshold for 8000 Hz in the left ear

R_500.Description: hearing threshold for 500 Hz in the right ear

R_1000.Description: hearing threshold for 1000 Hz in the right ear

R_2000.Description: hearing threshold for 2000 Hz in the right ear

R_3000.Description: hearing threshold for 3000 Hz in the right ear

R_4000.Description: hearing threshold for 4000 Hz in the right ear

R_6000.Description: hearing threshold for 6000 Hz in the right ear

R_8000.Description: hearing threshold for 8000 Hz in the right ear

note.Description: notes about number of EEG runs
